mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_moni_model_sysoid ( C_MODEL_ID, C_RESTYPE_ID, C_OS_TYPE, C_DEV_TYPE, C_SYS_OID, C_VENDOR_MODEL_ID,C_VENDOR_ID ) VALUES( #{modelId ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resTypeId ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{osType ,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{devType ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysOid ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vendorModelId ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vendorId ,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select:
SELECT C_MODEL_ID, C_RESTYPE_ID, C_OS_TYPE, C_DEV_TYPE, C_SYS_OID, C_VENDOR_MODEL_ID,C_VENDOR_ID FROM t_moni_model_sysoid
${orderBy}
